abstract: Andy Webster reviews Tetsuya Nakashima movie The World of Kanako.
lead_paragraph: Tetsuya Nakashima’s film about a father trying to rescue his teenage daughter from the Japanese underworld glories in its lurid bloodthirstiness.

headline.main: Review: In ‘The World of Kanako,’ the Old Ultraviolence
headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘The World of Kanako,’ the Old Ultraviolence

snippet: Tetsuya Nakashima’s film about a father trying to rescue his teenage daughter from the Japanese underworld glories in its lurid bloodthirstiness.
